full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Title (English and French)

* Parking management service
* Service de gestion des espaces de stationnement

#### Reference Number

* cb-974-84064317

#### Amendment Details

* Amendment Number: 3
* Amendment Date: 2024-03-04

#### Solicitation Number

* 1000254863

#### Publication and Closing Dates

* Publication Date: 2024-01-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-04T14:00:00 (EST)

#### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-29
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-28 2027
* Contract Duration: Initial contract period of three years with two additional one-year option periods

#### Requirements

* The proposed contractor will be responsible for managing parking space rentals (leases and vignettes), supply and install time and date stamps (electronic with vehicle registration), and ensure smooth parking meter operation in all seasons.
* The contractor will provide French and English personalized communication services to customers, whether on the web or by telephone in the Eastern Time Zone or Montreal Time.
* The contractor will also be responsible for financial management, including collection of monthly payments, interruption of service in case of non-payment, bookkeeping, and calculation of payments according to agreement rates.
* The contractor must provide detailed procedures, which must be documented and approved by the Ministry on February 12, 2024.
* The lease must be signed, stickers and access cards issued, and everything must be operational by April 1, 2024.

#### Security Requirements

* Unscreened contractors must be escorted by an employee or Commissionaire at all times when visiting Government of Canada facilities.
* Information used in the development of the contracted product must be unclassified material and considered releasable to the public by HC/PHAC and/or the Government of Canada.

#### Inquiries

Inquiries regarding this tender must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Christian Bélanger, via email at [christian.belanger@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:christian.belanger@hc-sc.gc.ca).

#### Attachment

The tender notice and solicitation document can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30132/1000254863-rfp-f_0.pdf (French) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/t
